item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - Yes - The Yes Album (Super Deluxe Edition) (2023) [Qobuz Hi-Res 24bits/96.0kHz] 4CD
item.description:
Yes - The Yes Album (Super Deluxe Edition)


Tracklist:

CD1
01 Yours Is No Disgrace (2023 Remaster)
02 Clap (2023 Remaster)
03 Starship Trooper: Life Seeker / Disillusion / Würm (2023 Remaster)
04 I've Seen All Good People: Your Move / All Good People (2023 Remaster)
05 A Venture (2023 Remaster)
06 Perpetual Change (2023 Remaster)

CD2
01 Yours Is No Disgrace (Steven Wilson Remix)
02 Starship Trooper: Life Seeker / Disillusion / Würm (Steven Wilson Remix)
03 I've Seen All Good People: Your Move / All Good People (Steven Wilson Remix)
04 A Venture (Steven Wilson Remix)
05 Perpetual Change (Steven Wilson Remix)
06 Yours Is No Disgrace (Steven Wilson Remix) [Instrumental]
07 Starship Trooper (Steven Wilson Remix) [Instrumental]
08 I've Seen All Good People (Steven Wilson Remix) [Instrumental]
09 A Venture (Steven Wilson Remix) [Instrumental]
10 Perpetual Change (Steven Wilson Remix) [Instrumental]

CD 3
01 Your Move (Single Version) (2023 Remaster)
02 Starship Trooper: Life Seeker (Single Version) (2023 Remaster)
03 Clap (Studio Version) (2023 Remaster)
04 A Venture (Extended Mix) (2023 Remaster)
05 Yours Is No Disgrace (Mono Mix) (2023 Remaster)
06 Clap (Mono Mix) (2023 Remaster)
07 Starship Trooper: Life Seeker / Disillusion / Würm (Mono Mix) (2023 Remaster)
08 I've Seen All Good People (Mono Mix) (2023 Remaster)
09 A Venture (Mono Mix) (2023 Remaster)
10 Perpetual Change (Mono Mix) (2023 Remaster)
11 Starship Trooper (Alternate Take) (2023 Remaster)
12 I've Seen All Good People: Your Move / All Good People (Early Take) (2023 Remaster)
13 Yours Is No Disgrace (Alternate Mix)

CD4
01 I've Seen All Good People (Live at Konserthuset, Gothenburg, Sweden, 1/21/1971)
02 Astral Traveller (Live at Konserthuset, Gothenburg, Sweden, 1/21/1971)
03 Everydays (Live at Konserthuset, Gothenburg, Sweden, 1/21/1971)
04 Yours Is No Disgrace (Live at The Yale Bowl, New Haven, CT, 7/24/1971) [2023 Remaster]
05 I've Seen All Good People: Your Move / All Good People (Live at The Yale Bowl, New Haven, CT, 7/24/1971)
06 Clap/Classical Gas (Live at The Yale Bowl, New Haven, CT, 7/24/1971)
07 Perpetual Change (Live at The Yale Bowl, New Haven, CT, 7/24/1971)
